fields.name: Puma Big Cat Backpack Black
fields.description:
Polyester/nylon blend for lightweight durability.
  Two-way zip opening and zip pockets on sides and front for optimum storage.
  Small zip case for added convenience.
  Adjustable and padded shoulder straps for added comfort.
 Slate-black in colour.
  18" length x 12" breadth.
  This backpack is big on space and style. It is light as a feather and looks stunningly good.

fields.name: Puma Men Ferrari Black Fleece Jacket
fields.description:
Black jacket made of blended fabric.
  Full sleeves with ribbed cuffs. 
 Front zippered placket. 
 Patch pocket on the left chest with Ferrari branding. 
 Italy's flag colours above the pocket and at the hemline.

fields.name: Puma Men Ferrari Track Jacket
fields.description:
85% cotton/15% polyester double knit jacket with fold over collar and ferrari logo styling. 
  Contrast stripes along the sleeves. 
  Ribbed, banded cuffs and hem.
  Zippered front pockets. 
  Iconic Ferrari badge at left chest. 
  Ferrari branding below back collar. 
  Italy badge on the right sleeve.

fields.name: Puma Cat Trainer-WBL Football
fields.description:
A football for soccer games in all weather conditions. 
  Puma's hi-tech airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 8-12 PSI,   0.6-0.8 bar. 
  Comes in a catchy white, black, lime coloured design with a puma leaping   cat symbol. 
  A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.

fields.name: Puma Power Cat Trainer-OB Football
fields.description:
A   football for soccer games in all weather conditions. 
 Puma's hi-tech airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 8-12 PSI,   0.6-0.8 bar. 
 This fluorescent orange, black and white coloured ball can be spotted   effortlessly during night games. 
 A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.

fields.name: Puma Power Cat Trainer-WR Football
fields.description:
A football for soccer games in all weather conditions. 
 Puma's hi-tech airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 8-12 PSI, 0.6-0.8 bar. 
 Comes in a catchy white, red, black coloured design with puma leaping cat symbol on it. 
 A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.

fields.name: Puma Power Cat Hard Ground Football
fields.description:
A football for soccer games on hard grounds in all weather conditions. 
 Puma's hi-tech perimeter balance technology. 
 Airlock valve to keep the ball bouncy at 10-15 PSI, 0.8-1.0 bar. 
 Comes in a catchy white, red, black coloured design with puma leaping cat symbol on it. 
 A size 5 football with 19 cm diameter.

fields.name: Quechua Red Sipper
fields.description:
Strongly made body with an attached cap.
 Durable and handy.
 Lightweight.
 Shock-resistant.
 This trendy looking sipper has a water level indicator and is very easy to   maintain. 
 It comes with a wide neck   that enables quick cleaning and spill-free refills. 
 Its ultra lightweight   ensures that you can take it along with you on that overnight trip or stay   hydrated on getaways.

fields.name: Quechua Forclaz Large  Backpack
fields.description:
Capacity: 61 litres. 
  Adjustable and designed for comfort with a ventilated mesh back. 
  3. Easy to carry. 
 Comes with compression straps,   chest strap, tensioners, hand rests. 
 Ample storage space with pockets   provided - 1 inner, 3 outer, 1 on belt.

fields.name: Domyos Men Grey Second Skin Jacket
fields.description:
Anatomical inserts adjust to the movements. 
  Flat and rolled seams ensure a comfortable Fit 
  Material - 95% cotton;  5% spandex. 
 This is the ultimate piece of jacket for any feel-good sport activity. 
 The feel of a second skin takes off that extra weight of a jacket. 
 This is an ideal buy and suited for any kind of activity.

fields.name: Quechua Easy-to-Carry Pink Sipper
fields.description:
Extremely light weight, approximately 150g. 
 Easy to carry, use as it comes with a tight lid and also with a safety latch to prevent leaks and spills. 
  Solvent-free, anti-flaking inner coating. 
 100% recyclable.

fields.name: Reebok Women Boat-Neck Wildberry Sweatshirt
fields.description:
Ideal winter wear. 
 .Trendy neckline with stitched stripes. 
 The bright berry colour of the sweatshirt makes an ideal excuse to be stylish!.

fields.name: Reebok Knit Rib Women Black Jacket
fields.description:
Composed of 100% polyester teslon fabric. 
  Stretchable fabric provides room for free movement. 
 Collared and zipped up, this jacket is a good bargain to climb up the style quotient as well as running away from the nip in the weather. 
 The red double stripes on the jacket adds that spark and glams up your look. 
 Since the fabric is made using latest weaving and other construction techniques for better durability and strength, you can be assured of its company till years to come.

fields.name: Kipsta F300 Football Size 5 Football
fields.description:
Supple, good feel of the ball. 
  Bouncy on all surfaces due to butyl bladder, cotton and polyester filling. 
  Durably made with 32 machine-stitched panels, 4-ply polyester/viscose laminate. 
  Ball feel TPU cover. 
 This kipsta branded football is durable and a great choice for use in football matches, tournaments.

fields.name: Kipsta F300 Football
fields.description:
Supple, good feel of the ball. 
  Bouncy on all surfaces due to butyl bladder, cotton and polyester filling. 
  Made to last with 32 machine-stitched panels, 4-ply polyester/viscose laminate. 
  Ball feel TPU cover. 
 This kipsta branded football is durable and a great one to use in football matches and tournaments.

fields.name: Kipsta Xtra Bounce Basketball
fields.description:
Long-lasting tournament quality Basketball. 
 Exclusive Easy Shoot design. 
 Tyre-like sculpted rubber panels for excellent grip. 
 Extra bounce due to butyl, and rubber bladder for excellent bounce on all playing surfaces. 
 Abrasion resistant rubber and sculpted panels for high durability.

fields.name: Quechua Ultralight Backpack 16 Ltr
fields.description:
Designed for walkers, this Arpenaz 15  Ultralight bag is compact and can be folded into ball when not in use. 
 16 litres. 
 Made of 100% polyamide for durability and comfort. 
 One main zippered compartment and one outer zippered pocket with ample space to stash away belongings. 
 Shoulder straps for easy handling. 
 Drawcord to hold the bag when it's rolled into a ball.

fields.name: Quechua Unisex Ultralight 16 Ltr Green Backpack
fields.description:
Designed for walkers, this Arpenaz 15  Ultralight bag is compact and can be folded into ball when not in use. 
 16 litres. 
 Made of 100% polyamide for durability and comfort. 
 One main zippered compartment and one outer zippered pocket with ample space to stash away belongings. 
 Shoulder straps for easy handling. 
 Drawcord to hold the bag when it's rolled into a ball.

fields.name: Nike Men Windrunner Blue Jacket
fields.description:
Blue jacket made of a blended fabric. 
 Ribbed turtle neck. 
 Full sleeves with ribbed cuffs and hem. 
 Front zipper and zippered pockets on the sides. 
 This high neck jacket would protect you from the cold as well as make a style statement as long as you are wearing it!

fields.name: Nike Men Windrunner Blue/Black Jacket
fields.description:
Blue jacket made of a blended fabric. 
 Ribbed turtle neck. 
 Full sleeves with ribbed cuffs and hem. 
 Front zipper and zippered pockets on the sides. 
 This high neck jacket would protect you from the cold as well as make a style statement as long as you are wearing it!

fields.name: Puma Deck Black Backpack
fields.description:
Durable fabric that will last for years. 
 Front zip pocket for easy access. 
  1 large chamber along with a smaller one, separated by two zippers. 
  Adjustable and padded straps for maximum comfort and minimum stress or strain. 
 20" length and 12" breadth. 
 Functionality and style do not come in a package better than this! 
  With its awesome Italian styling and ultra light weight, this backpack is worth every penny.

fields.name: Adidas Womens Fitted Black Top
fields.description: This is an essential black, halter necked polyester top which can be worn both as Sports wear and a fashion piece.

fields.name: Adidas Womens Very Berry Lycra Track Pants
fields.description:
Purple track pants made of cotton-lycra fabric. 
 Comfortable broad elasticated waist and embroidered branding on the left waist.

fields.name: Adidas Womens Sunset Lycra Fit Track Pants
fields.description:
Chosen from the adidas fitness and sportswear range for women, these black track pants with bright trims add style to your look while you focus on performance. 
 Ideal for all your fitness, sports training and competition needs. 
 These cotton-lycra track pants allow easy movement and do not lose shape even after years.

fields.name: Adidas Womens Essential Black Capris
fields.description:
Black capris made of a cotton and lycra mix fabric. 
 Drawcord elastic waist. 
 Embroidered logo on the left and Adidas Essentials 3-Stripes along the length.

fields.description:

 Ideal for all your fitness, sports training and competition needs. 
 These cotton-lycra track pants allow easy movement and do not lose shape even after years.

 These cotton-lycra pants allow easy movement and does not lose shape even after years.

fields.description:
Designed to give you comfort and style while adding to your performance. 
 Ideal for all your fitness, sports training and competition needs as these black adidas track pants keep you comfortably cool.

fields.description:
Designed to give you comfort and style while adding to your performance.

fields.name: Adidas Mens Grey Logo T-shirt
fields.description: Ideal for sports and fitness training at the cool neighborhood gym or sports club.

fields.name: Adidas Mens Lead Light Track Pants
fields.description:
Designed to give you comfort and style while adding to your performance. 
 Ideal for all your fitness, sports training and competition needs as these black adidas track pants keep you comfortably cool.

fields.name: Nike Grey Women Sweatshirt
fields.description:
Grey, round neck, full arm t-shirt made of brushed cotton. 
 Comfort Fit. 
 This full-sleeve tee will keep you warm during those spells and doubles up as a smart winter wear too.

fields.name: Reebok Men's Stripe Silver trainer
fields.description:
Breathable mesh upper. 
 Light weight phylon midsole. 
 Carbon rubber outsole for grip. 
 These premium reebok trainers provide an irritation-free fit. 
 The Reebok Silver sports trainers come with cushioned soles that provide traction and durability. 
 The mesh upper provides support and flexibility by moving with the natural motion of your feet. 
 Ideal for running, walking, Sports and fitness activities.

fields.name: Reebok Men Frisky Attraction Grey Trainers
fields.description:
Breathable mesh upper. 
 Light weight phylon midsole. 
 Phylon outsole with a large reebok symbol on the sides. 
 The reebok Frisky Attraction trainers come with cushioned soles that provide traction on all paths and surfaces. 
  The mesh upper provides support and flexibility by adapting to your feet. 
  These reebok trainers provide an irritation-free Fit.

fields.name: Adidas Black Bounce Unisex Basketball
fields.description:
Vulcanised rubber. 
 Size 3. 
 The iconic 3-Stripes wrap around the body of this basketball for a fun look, whether you're playing in the gym or outside.

fields.name: Adidas New York Red Bull Trophy Football
fields.description:
100% TPU cover. 
 Butyl bladder. 
 A durable, machine-stitched construction responds to every touch.

fields.name: Adidas Black & White Basketball
fields.description:
Size 7 Basketball with sculpted rubber panels for excellent grip. 
 Long lasting tournament Dwight Adidas basketball. 
 Abrasion resistant rubber for high durability and extra bounce on all playing surfaces.

fields.name: Adidas White Water Sipper
fields.description:
Lightweight and Shock-resistant. 
 This handy adidas water sipper bottle has a water level indicator and is very easy to maintain. 
  It has a capacity of 500ml and a spout to ensure spill-free usage. 
  Its lightweight ensures that you can take it along with you to stay hydrated everywhere. 
  The wide neck lid allows for quick cleaning of this Adidas sipper. 
  Ideal for walking, running, sports and fitness enthusiasts.

fields.name: Domyos Women Black Capri
fields.description:
Cotton lycra capri with broad waist band. 
 The broad waist band on this cotton lycra capri gives you that perfect Fit when on a fitness mode.

fields.name: Asics Women White GEL Strike 2 Blue Trainers
fields.description: White and blue running shoes in synthetic leather with mesh upper, reflective material, California slip and solid, high abrasion rubber outsole with Gel Strike 2 technology.

fields.name: Asics Women Sport GEL Cushioning White Trainers
fields.description: White running shoes in synthetic leather with mesh upper, reflective material, California slip and solid, high abrasion rubber outsole with Gel Cushioning technology.

fields.name: Asics Mens Gel Cushioning White Navy Trainers
fields.description: White and navy blue running shoes with removable sockliner, leather based upper, rear foot cushion with Gel Cushioning System and heel plug.

fields.name: Asics Mens Sport Running Gel-Pulse 2 Silver Red Trainers
fields.description: Silver and red running shoes with anti-microbial properties, trusstic system, open mesh upper, rear foot cushioning with Gel Cushioning system and outsole with AHAR.

fields.name: Asics Women Sport Gel Pulse 2 Blue White Trainers
fields.description:
Constructed  with a lightweight, breathable mesh upper, the Asics Gel Pulse 2  running shoe ensures it offers ample ventilation to the feet, keeping  them dry, fresh and free of sweat. 
 Engineered with a rearfoot Gel  cushioning system, the heel is well locked in place and is protected  from impact, allowing for a smooth mid-distance transition. 
 The insole  is also built with a Comforter Sockliner that not only provides ample  cushioning, enhancing performance, but also employs anti-microbial  properties, creating a cooler, drier and healthier environment inside  the shoe.

fields.name: Asics Men Sport White Blue Gel Cushioning Trainers
fields.description:
White and blue lightweight running shoes with open mesh upper. 
 Trusstic sole unit. 
 GEL Cushioning system and high abrasion rubber outsole with AHAR.

fields.name: Adidias Women Vanquish White Silver Trainers
fields.description:
Synthetic leather white shoes with nylon mesh upper. 
 Rubber outsole with grip nubs. 
 Comfort cushioning on the insole and EVA sockliner.

fields.name: Adidias Women Royal Freshgold Purple Socks
fields.description:
Synthetic leather white shoes with nylon mesh upper. 
 Rubber outsole with grip nubs. 
 Comfort cushioning on the insole and EVA sockliner.

fields.name: Puma Women Faas 300 Pink White Blue Trainers
fields.description:
Mesh upper with synthetic suede overlays for structure and breathability. Formstripe on both sides. Cushioned collar and tongue for plush comfort
  • Lace-ups for snug Fit. Full-length lateral groove in the midsole to reinforce stability throughout the gait cycle. OrthoLite sockliner for superior comfort, material regeneration, air circulation and anti-microbial function. EverRide technology to reduce weight and improve forefoot cushioning. EverTrack used in the outsole for greater durability in high-wear areas. Rocker shape of outsole allows for natural stride with an effortless toe-off. Flex grooves built across the waffle patterned outsole to enhance flexibility.

fields.name: Nike Womens EM Tempo Pink Short
fields.description:
Made of 100% polyester, with a 100% polyester lining. 
 Engineered with Dri-Fit technology. 
 In-built underwear. 
 Elasticated waist with a drawstring. 
 Side meshed panels in white with a black piping and embroidered nike swoosh on the left leg.

fields.name: Nike Womens EM Tempo Purple Short
fields.description:
Made of 100% polyester, with a 100% polyester lining. 
 Engineered with Dri-Fit technology. 
 In-built underwear. 
 Elasticated waist with a drawstring. 
 Side meshed panels in white with a black piping and embroidered nike swoosh on the left leg.

fields.name: Nike Unisex Brasilia 4 Navy Blue Duffle Bag
fields.description:
Height:11.5" 
 Width: 12" 
 Depth: 25.4" 
 Capacity: 58 L 
 Made of nylon and polyester with a nylon lining for durability and easy cleaning. 
 Branded zippers and sliders for easy use and longer life of the bag. 
 One main copiously compartment that has a zippered pouch on the inside and contoured zipper closure. 
 Pockets on either side, one of which has a mesh panel. 
 Swoosh logo on the front and the side of the pocket. 
 Synthetic haul loops for handling ease that comes with a velcro roll. 
 Adjustable synthetic padded shoulder straps.

fields.name: Spalding NBA Highlight Red Basketball
fields.description:
Offering absolute grip with a unique retro design, this NBA Highlights Basketball works equally great indoors and outdoors. 
 Made of durable rubber that helps facilitate a great game on all court surfaces. 
 Nubs throughout the ball surface offering absolute grip and great game characteristics. 
 Brand name and collection printed in gold and black.

fields.name: Spalding  NBA Team Toronto Raptors SZ7 Red Basketball
fields.description:
Gear up and hone your gaming skills with this School NBA Basketball from spalding. 
  Made of composite leather and with absolute gaming technology, this is one of the best basketballs you can ever own to up the ante of your skills. 
 Made of composite leather for durability. 
 Nubs throughout the ball surface offering absolute grip and great game characteristics. 
 Wide channels that ensures great bounce. 
 Branding and team name printed for style.

fields.name: Spalding  NBA Team Dallas Mavericks SZ7 Red Basketball
fields.description:
Gear up and hone your gaming skills with this School NBA Basketball from spalding. 
  Made of composite leather and with absolute gaming technology, this is one of the best basketballs you can ever own to up the ante of your skills. 
 Made of composite leather for durability. 
 Nubs throughout the ball surface offering absolute grip and great game characteristics. 
 Wide channels that ensures great bounce. 
 Branding and team name printed for style.

fields.name: Nike Unisex China Swsh Ct White Socks
fields.description:
Made of cotton, nylon and spandex, it provides all-day comfort, stretch and moisture wicking properties. 
 The arch support offers a secure, stable Fit. 
 Greater shock absorption properties. 
 Brand name woven on the rolled down cuffs. 
 Rib knit cuff with roomy toe area for superior comfort and durability.

fields.name: Nike Unisex Ap Snl G White Socks
fields.description:
White Sports socks made of 77% cotton, 22% nylon and 1% spandex. 
 Moisture-wicking properties with arch support. 
 Half-cushion terry foot. 
 07 with nike Swoosh printed on the top.

fields.name: Nike Unisex  Black Socks
fields.description:
Black Sports socks made of 77% cotton, 22% nylon and 1% spandex. 
 Ankle cuff, arch support, half-cushion terry. 
 Brand name and logo printed.

fields.name: Nike Men Coolfitted White T-Shirt
fields.description:
White t-shirt made of 100% knit polyester. 
 Mesh panels on the sides below the short sleeves and on the upper to middle back. 
 Round neck with series branding printed on back neckline and nike swoosh logo printed on left shoulder blade.

fields.name: Nike Mens Summerized Wind Runner White Jacket
fields.description:
Hooded jacket made of 100% nylon. 
 Light blue body and purple upper, mesh inner, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

fields.name: Nike Mens Summerized Wind Runner Orange Jacket
fields.description:

fields.name: Nike Mens Ast 90ss Graphic Black T-Shirt
fields.description:
Grey round neck training t-shirt made of 100% polyester. 
  Dri-Fit fabric, with sublimated print.

fields.name: Nike Sport Hi Quarter Pack of 3 Socks
fields.description:
Made of 77% cotton, 22% nylon and 1% spandex. 
  It provides all-day comfort, stretch and moisture wicking properties. 
 The arch support offers a secure, stable Fit. 
 Greater shock absorption properties. 
 1st pair is melange grey with white and light blue bands.

 3rd pair is light blue with a dark navy blue band under the cuffs. 
 Brand name woven on the side of the cuffs for all three pairs. 
 Rib knit cuff with roomy toe area for superior comfort and durability.

fields.name: Nike Women Sports White Socks
fields.description:

fields.name: Nike Ball Carry Navy Blue Backpack
fields.description:
Height: 19"  
 Width: 15"  
 Depth: 10"  
 Capacity: 32 litres

 Inner lining made of 78% nylon and 22% polyester. 
 Branded zippers and sliders for easy use and longer life of the bag . 
 One main copiously spaced zippered compartment with a small pouch that has a velcro closure. 
 One front zippered compartment with two zippered side pouches. 
 Synthetic haul loop for handling ease . 
 Wide, adjustable padded handles and ergonomically padded back for carrying ease.

Branded zippers and sliders for easy use and longer life of the bag . One main copiously spaced zippered compartment with a small pouch that has a velcro closure. One front zippered compartment with two zippered side pouches. Synthetic haul loop for handling ease . Wide, adjustable padded handles and ergonomically padded back for carrying ease.

fields.name: Fila Women White Pack of 3 Socks
fields.description:
Pack of 3 white ankle length socks, 
 contrast colored ribbed mouths, 
 one pair in lime green, a pair in pink and a pair in turquoise, 
  contrast stripes in same colors at heel and toe area, 
 white Fila branding at mouths above heel, 
 comfort grip leaves no marks, 
 soft seam for extra comfort, 
 terry base with secure fit and cushioned heels.

fields.name: Nike Solid White Socks
fields.description:
Made from a cotton/nylon/spandex blend  for a secure, enhanced grip and exemplary comfort. 
  Moisture wicking to keep feet dry and comfy. 
  Arch support for a customised fit. 
  Half-cushion terry foot for shock-absorption. 
  Breathable sole with softly elasticated broad ribbed cuff to ensure a soft grip. 
  Brand swoosh printed on the ribbed cuff.

fields.name: Wildcraft Grey Duffle Bag
fields.description:
Two short handles with padded tab secured with a Velcro closure. 
 Detachable and adjustable sling strap with a shoulder pad. 
 One main zip compartment. 
 Three external zip pockets.

fields.name: Wildcraft Gear for Life Green Duffle Bag
fields.description:
Height: 25 cm. 
 Width: 33 cm. 
 Depth: 13 cm 
 Made of 450D polyester for durability and comfort. 
 One main zippered compartment with a divider flap. 
 front slash zippered pocket. 
 balloon front pocket and two meshed water bottle holders. 
 Detachable, adjustable and padded waist belt. 
 Detachable shoulder straps for easy handling.

fields.name: Wildcraft Explorer Black & Red Duffle Bag
fields.description:
Two short handles. 
 detachable adjustable sling strap with a shoulder pad. 
 One main zip compartment. 
 Two external zip pocket on the sides. 
 One external zip pocket on the front.

fields.name: Nike Mens Tempo Navy Blue Shorts
fields.description:
Made of 100% polyester, 
 Engineered with Dri-Fit technology. 
 Built-in brief. 
 Elasticated waist with drawstrings. 
 Grey and orange stripe detailing with mesh panels along the sides. 
 Nike swoosh printed on the left leg.

fields.name: Nike Mens Black Speed Fly Shorts
fields.description:
Made of 100% polyester, 
 Engineered with Dri-Fit technology. 
 Elasticated waist with drawcord. 
 Two insert pockets on the sides. 
 Nike swoosh printed on the left leg.

fields.name: Proline Black Sports Shorts

A pair of black knitted mid-rise sports shorts. 
 Two pockets. 
 Elasticated waistband.

fields.name: Adidas White Socks
fields.description:
Coral pink knitted tank top. 
  Round neck. 
 Racerback styling.

fields.name: Nike Womens White Top
fields.description:
White boat neck T-shirt. 
 Abstract silver geometric print on front. 
 Short raglan sleeves. 
 Flat lock detail at all seams. 
  Printed brand logo at back neck to provide abrasion free comfort.

fields.name: Nike Womens Moss Green Top
fields.description:

  Printed brand logo at back neck to provide abrasion free comfort.

fields.name: Nike Black Training Shoes Backpack
fields.description:
Height: 34 cm 
 Width: 20 cm 
 Depth: 15 cm 
 Black bag made of Tarpaulin which is durable, water-resistant material. 
 Has a main zippered compartment on the front. 
 Fabric haul loop. 
 Nike swoosh logo printed on the front and brand name printed on the right side.
